work.movement: Introduction: Combat - Tumult - Intervention of the Prince
Romeo Alone - Sadness - Distant sounds of music and dancing - Great festivities in Capulet's palace (Ball Scene)
Star-lit night - Capulet's garden, silent and deserted - The young Capulets, leaving the hall, pass by singing fragements of the dance music (Love scene, Adagio)
Queen Mab, or the Fairy of dreams (Scherzo)
Romeo in the family vault of the Capulets; Invocation - Juliet's awakening - Delirious joy, despair, anguish, and death of both the lovers
